item.title: AUTUMN MENTAL DETOXIFICATION
item.dc:creator: yesiamalamin
item.description: Changes in seasons have been seen in Ayurveda as a period to take care of your health. It means both the aspect, your body and your mind. Now autumn is here, I will be telling you why is it so important to do autumn detox, how it affects your health and how to do it.
item.content:encoded: Changes in seasons have been seen in Ayurveda as a period to take care of your health. It means both the aspect, your body and your mind. Now autumn is here, I will be telling you why is it so important to do autumn detox, how it affects your health and how to do it.

item.title: ARE YOU EXPERIENCING HAIR LOSS IN AUTUMN?
item.dc:creator: yesiamalamin
item.description: Internal Advice Recently I had a lot of hair loss in Autumn. The quality of my hair was also thinning. So it was time to use the power of Ayurveda to help my hair. So I started working on my hair with these three easy steps, and definitely, the hair fall has reduced
item.content:encoded: Internal Advice Recently I had a lot of hair loss in Autumn. The quality of my hair was also thinning. So it was time to use the power of Ayurveda to help my hair. So I started working on my hair with these three easy steps, and definitely, the hair fall has reduced

item.title: THE SILENT METABOLISM REDUCER
item.dc:creator: yesiamalamin
item.description: Women are all over struggling with challenges with maintaining a healthy weight and metabolism. With Ayurveda, it is easy to set your metabolism in the right way, so no one has to struggle with weight. Ayurveda contributes to helping one lifestyle, mindset, nutrition
item.content:encoded: Women are all over struggling with challenges with maintaining a healthy weight and metabolism. With Ayurveda, it is easy to set your metabolism in the right way, so no one has to struggle with weight. Ayurveda contributes to helping one lifestyle, mindset, nutrition
